typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SID as string,
		RS as string,
		YMD as string,
		HMS as string,
		TOD as string,
		XDMSKB as string,
		JBN as string,
		XDMID as string,
		ACTID as string,
		GUNTBN as string,
		ACTTBN as string,
		ACTPROC as string,
		KTM as string,
		UID as string,
		UAP as string,
		TRN as string,
		STP as string,
		STP2 as string,
		KNSSKB as string,
		JIKKAH as string,
		JIKKNG as string,
		TKNUSR as string,
		JIKSHA as string,
		EVTTYP as string,
		ENTSTP as string,
		SCMNAM as string,
		OBJNAM as string,
		OBJTYP as string,
		HNKKNG as string,
		HNKSKB as string,
		HNTKNG as string,
		ROLNAM as string,
		GRPNAM as string,
		SSNNUM as string,
		SQLCOD as string,
		HIRUAP as string,
		SRVNAM as string,
		OPECOD as string,
		OBJONR as string,
		OBJMID as string,
		OBJTIM as string,
		SQLBUN as string,
		SQLDAT as string,
		SQLKEN as string,
		KNSBAN as string,
		FILLER as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		SID,
		RS,
		YMD,
		HMS,
		TOD,
		XDMSKB,
		JBN,
		XDMID,
		ACTID,
		GUNTBN,
		ACTTBN,
		ACTPROC,
		KTM,
		UID,
		UAP,
		TRN,
		STP,
		STP2,
		KNSSKB,
		JIKKAH,
		JIKKNG,
		TKNUSR,
		JIKSHA,
		EVTTYP,
		ENTSTP,
		SCMNAM,
		OBJNAM,
		OBJTYP,
		HNKKNG,
		HNKSKB,
		HNTKNG,
		ROLNAM,
		GRPNAM,
		SSNNUM,
		SQLCOD,
		HIRUAP,
		SRVNAM,
		OPECOD,
		OBJONR,
		OBJMID,
		OBJTIM,
		SQLBUN,
		SQLDAT,
		SQLKEN,
		KNSBAN,
		FILLER
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string
	),
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
